title: Biotic and abiotic components of the environment

content.prompt: Which of the following best illustrates an abiotic component of the environment affecting a biotic component of the environment?

choices.label: Composted manure is added to agricultural soil during spring tilling.
Coral reefs modify the direction of an ocean current.
Plants release O2 into the atmosphere during photosynthesis.
Low phosphorus content in soil limits the growth of vegetation.
A thick planting of ground cover reduces soil erosion on a hillside.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
